quote: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Once you make a decision, the universe conspires to make it happen.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am the product of my decisions.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: It doesn't matter how slowly you go as long as you don't stop
author: Confucius

quote: A man is what he thinks about all day long.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I am not an Athenian or a Greek, but a citizen of the world.
author: Socrates

quote: Don't explain your philosophy. Embody it.
author: Epictetus

quote: Make your own Bible. Select and collect all the words and sentences that in all your readings have been to you like the blast of a trumpet.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Better is a poor but wise youth than an old but foolish king who no longer knows caution. For from a prison house, he came forth to reign; despite his kingship he was born poor.
author: Ecclesiastes 4:13-14

quote: They must often change, who would be constant in happiness or wisdom.
author: Confucius

quote: Prefer knowledge over wealth, for the one is transitory and the other perpetual.
author: Socrates

quote: No one is free but the educated.
author: Plato

quote: Freedom is sweet and it is a blessing. Those who would give up essential liberty, to purchase a little temporary safety, deserve neither liberty nor safety.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The worst form of inequality is to try to make unequal things equal.
author: Aristotle
